About

Summary

I am an intern at SOS Children's Villages International with experience in systems and data management, IT support, JavaScript, music production, and radio. I am passionate about social development issues and using technology to give people a platform for their projects.

Web Development

I started coding with javascript since early 2019. Since then, I have been focused on mastering the basics of the language and learnt how to implement my code alongside HTML and CSS. I have just started working with frameworks, such as React, and am exited to utlitise my knowledge in new projects and websites.

Music Production

I compose rhythmic and atmospheric electronica. Some of my early music is published @Enkidu on Sound Cloud and YouTube. I hope to release more compositions in an album using Ableton Live.
